description: Defines a RecyclerView Adapter and ViewHolder for displaying Product objects in a list, with diffing capabilities for efficient updates.
external_files: R (resource file, e.g., layout and id resources)

classes.name: ProductAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of Product objects with optimized diffing.

classes.name: ProductVH
classes.description: ViewHolder class that binds Product data to item views in the RecyclerView.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the layout for a product item and creates a new ProductVH.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds the Product data at a given position to the ViewHolder.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Populates the item view with the product's image, title, and price, and sets click listener.
